item.title: Communication Technology
item.description: Summary There are many different options for staying connected while overseas. If you’re only staying for a short time then opting for an international plan with your current carrier may be best. Since I’m traveling for an extended amount of time I chose to cancel my United States service and obtain a service when overseas. Keeping your number Unfortunately, if you just cancel your service, without transferring to another carrier, you will lose your number.
